experience: You and Dale both know Pamela Metivier, Lance Faulkner, CSM, CSPO, and 40 others
Good morning!  I am looking for referrals to ad/marketing agencies in the greater Phoenix area and am hoping that you all can help me out.
Thank you in advance for your recommendations!
We find inspiration between the data and the design, helping businesses solve problems while making the  customer smile.

• Directed global digital marketing initiatives for North America, EMEA and APAC business units• Responsible for all digital platform development and digital marketing solutions to drive both brand exposure and lead generation • Guided strategy and execution of all paid media deliverables, including display, landing pages, retargeting and social media with a focus on content strategy and quality lead generation• Oversaw the development team and led all information architecture / agile prototyping• Managed multi-million dollar budget with forecasting across all digital channels and global locations• Drove implementation of a project management system that allowed global departments to have full transparency and communication• Strategized IO’s first full implementation of marketing automation (Marketo) that synced with the content relationship management system (Microsoft Dynamics)• Led strategy and development of digital sales tools, including an interactive 18’x8’ multi-touch display that was featured at Gartner events worldwide and an IO Tour app that utilizes beacon technology

• Managed and interfaced with two of Lavidge’s largest digital clients on all digital initiatives• Championed and expanded the digital offerings at Lavidge to include interactive displays (Intel AIM Suite), augmented applications (Unity) and digital signage (Scala, BrightSign)• Partnered with the new business development team to create digital marketing material and demos• Led and strategized information architecture and UX design in conjunction with the creative and development team• Drove strategic integration of traditional and digital marketing processes and culture• Undefeated foosball champion 3 years in a row!Clients:Massage Envy Spa Corporate, United Rentals, Blue Cross Blue Shield of Arizona, Cable One, Republic Services, Vistancia and Meritage Homes

• Built a digital agency from the ground up that was trusted by Fortune 500 companies to execute innovative digital work• Directed and marketed the first crowdsourced online book, “Conspiracy of the Rich”, which was published and written by Robert Kiyosaki• Partnered with the top advertising agencies to strategize, design and develop award-winning workClients:Boeing, Zynga, PGA Tour Experience, Winter X Games, Linksys (Cisco), XBox, Toni & Guy, Shamrock Farms, Discount Tires, 2XL Games, Red Bull, Hewlett Packard, AOL Red and Rich Dad Poor Dad - Robert Kiyosaki
• Oversaw the creative team• Developed storyboards, design and animated motion graphics• Executed front-end code and Flash developmentClients:Nike, Mazda USA, Chevy, Rockford Fosgate and Ford SVT

Organized a 5th grade club basketball team with local volunteers and led the efforts in recruiting a college assistant coach, to be the head coach for our team. The goal of our organization is to mentor young boys into men of character on and off the court.

summary: Senior level digital marketing leader with 20+ years of experience and a proven track record in devising both creative and digital marketing strategies. Experienced as a digital agency owner, a director at a top advertising agency and a global digital team leader on the client side. As a cross-disciplined marketer, I am able to leverage my expertise and communication skills to create innovative and award-winning work while accomplishing business objectives.Areas of expertise include:- Multi-Channel Digital Marketing- Campaign Strategy- Budget Management- Marketing Automation- Website / Application Design and Development- User Interface Design- Emerging Technology- Information Architecture- Search Engine Optimization- Search Engine Marketing- Email Marketing- Web Analytics & ReportingSpecialties: Interactive Strategy, Digital Marketing, Marketing Technology, Digital Platform Management, Marketing Automation, Email Marketing, Project Management, Enterprise Web Development, Search Engine Optimization (SEO), Search Engine Marketing (SEM), Content Management, Web Analytics, User Experience Design, Team Leadership, Team Building
name: Dale Castro
title: Owner + Digital Strategist / User Experience
